title: Word Zone
description:
<!--StartFragment-->

“The **word of GOD** is also like Vitamins. You don't want it, but you need it, in order for you to be strong.” “If you wish to grow in spirit, feed on the spiritual food, the HOLY**WORD**.” “Always pray for your plans ,so that **the Lord**can see to it, that they happen.”



<!--EndFragment-->
seo_description: “The **word of GOD** is also like Vitamins. You don't want it, but you need it, in order for you to be strong.” “If you wish to grow in spirit, feed on the spiritual food, the HOLY**WORD**.” “Always pray for your plans ,so that **the Lord**can see to it, that they happen.”
